text:
这是一个很特别的男主，他很博爱，很喜欢照顾女人，当然这不能算一个毛病，风【蟹】流，男人本xing嘛，这个本无可厚非。
可是……如果他老是喜欢照顾别人的女人呢？ =_=|||
内容标签：欢喜冤家 江湖恩怨 近水楼台 怅然若失

trans:
This is a very unique male protagonist. He is affectionate and loves taking care of women. Of course, this isn’t inherently a flaw—his flirtatious nature can be chalked up to the typical tendencies of men, which isn’t entirely unreasonable.
But… what if he always prefers taking care of other people’s women? =_=|||
